main event: A civilian reported observing a saucer-shaped UFO on 8 Nov 66 in Sparks, Georgia.
interesting points: The UFO was described as silver and approximately the size of a semi-truck in width and 18-19 feet in height., The observer saw the UFO on the ground before it became airborne at a shallow angle., The object emitted one flashing red light and several glowing white lights., The car radio began buzzing as the UFO approached the vehicle., The object departed almost straight upward after following the observer's car for a short distance.
witness description: telephone operator in Valdosta, GA, considered to be reliable
